question: Which of the following missiles of India is a "supersonic cruise missile"?
explanation: On 16 July, India\'s supersonic cruise missile BrahMos was test fired from the Integrated Test Range (ITR) at Chandipur, Odisha under extreme conditions. Brahmos is India\'s only supersonic cruise missile and it can cruise at speeds of up to Mach 3.0, or three times the speed of sound.
